elements.description: Shows a dialog that allows the user to install the current instant app.
elements.name: instantapp.show_install_prompt

elements.description: Checks if application loaded as instant experience.
elements.name: instantapp.is_instant_app

returnvalues.doc: Returns true if this application is an instant app.
returnvalues.name: boolean

elements.description: Gets the maximum size in bytes of the cookie data an instant app can store on the device.
elements.name: instantapp.get_cookie_max_size

returnvalues.doc: The maximum size in bytes of the cookie data an instant app can store on the device.
returnvalues.name: number

elements.description: Load byte array from cookies that were saved in instant application.
elements.name: instantapp.get_cookie

returnvalues.doc: The byte array data of cookies saved in instant application.
returnvalues.name: string

elements.description: Save byte array in cookies to be able get access to this data in installable application.
elements.name: instantapp.set_cookie

parameters.doc: The byte array data will be saved in cookies for access in installable application.
parameters.name: bytes

info.description: Functions and constants for interacting with InstantApp APIs
info.name: extension-googleplayinstant
